data.text:
New stats from Chicago-based @United show it was the airline's 3rd busiest Thanksgiving travel period.

United reports smooth ops T-giving week:
* 86% flights arrived on-time
* Only 1 cancellation at O'Hare

It's a big improvement from struggles many carriers faced this summer.
